title: Vagaro
summary: Book beauty and fitness appointments with Salons, Spas, Gyms and Fitness studios
description: This app will allow you to find Salons, Spas and Fitness Studios in your local area. Read reviews and book an appointments from your phone or tablet with respective businesses. Get email and text reminders for your appointments. Collect and redeem points towards services, read reviews and search for local deals.Imagine being able to search and book a Massage in San Francisco on Friday at 7pm. Vagaro Spa Booker and Salon Booker will do the search for you, find the best match, show you the prices and reviews of the listed businesses and allow you to book the appointment without making one phone call. You will than get email text, or push notification reminders of your appointments and much more. Salon Booking and Spa Booking is now easy with this Salon finder and Spa finder. Book with Hair Salons, Makeup Artists, Nail artists, Day Spas, Massages, Tanning Salons, Skin Care, Hair removal, Botox, Electrolysis and PhotographersYou can also do your Salon Search and Spa Search online using our website at www.Vagaro.com. Tools for your mind and body from Vagaro!
descriptionHTML:
This app will allow you to find Salons, Spas and Fitness Studios in your local area. Read reviews and book an appointments from your phone or tablet with respective businesses. Get email and text reminders for your appointments. Collect and redeem points towards services, read reviews and search for local deals.

Imagine being able to search and book a Massage in San Francisco on Friday at 7pm. Vagaro Spa Booker and Salon Booker will do the search for you, find the best match, show you the prices and reviews of the listed businesses and allow you to book the appointment without making one phone call. You will than get email text, or push notification reminders of your appointments and much more.

Salon Booking and Spa Booking is now easy with this Salon finder and Spa finder. Book with Hair Salons, Makeup Artists, Nail artists, Day Spas, Massages, Tanning Salons, Skin Care, Hair removal, Botox, Electrolysis and Photographers

You can also do your Salon Search and Spa Search online using our website at www.Vagaro.com.

Tools for your mind and body from Vagaro!
comments: I CALLED in and spoke with a live person for somebody else I had referred there to  make an appointment for them with a barber I do not use ... what ended up happening is the person I made the appointment for had no appointment and then I noticed I had notifications I have an appointment waiting for myself with MY barber... irritated!!!!!!
Great app! Easy to use. Has a lot of great businesses. I definitely recommend it to anyone!

Makes booking appointments so easy! I actually found my current "Go-To" salon with this app! I can see the cost of services, choose my provider, and book the appointment whenever I feel like it! It's made scheduling so much easier for me!
Love the text and calendar reminders. I've found all my favorite nails, hair, and massages places from this app!
recentChanges: • Ability to sell custom packages, membership and products.
As always your kind reviews are always inspiring.
